name: Heat Signature

files.file1: N/A:Select the game's archive downloaded from Humble Bundle

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Select the game's archive downloaded from Humble Bundle
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/users/$USER/Heat Signature/Heat Signature.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Heat Signature
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
